QuestData.Title: Small Haulers
QuestData.Description:
<sniff>
They said they would feed us. Said they'd keep us warm.
<Olive runs the sleeve of her coat across her nose.>
But they were mean! And it was really hard work. And when we tried to rest, they yelled at us!
<sniff>
I got away, but my friends are still in there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free $1oa Urchin Workers from the Ashvane Foundry.
QuestData.RewardText: These kids are gonna have it hard enough without being under Ashvane's thumb. Thanks for getting them out.
